SELECT NOTICE_BOARD_NUM , NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE , MEMBER_ID
, (SELECT CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE) THEN TO_CHAR(NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END FROM DUAL) NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE
, NOTICE_BOARD_READ_CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD
WHERE UPPER(${searchType}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY NOTICE_BOARD_NUM DESC
OFFSET (#{nowPage} - 1) * #{displayDataCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayDataCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NOTICE_BOARD_NUM , NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE , NOTICE_BOARD_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , TO_CHAR(NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD | HH24:MI') NOTICE_BOARD_CREATE_DATE , NOTICE_BOARD_READ_CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_BOARD_NUM = #{noticeBoardNum}
SELECT NOTICE_BOARD_NUM , NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_BOARD_NUM = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTICE_BOARD_NUM),0) FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_BOARD_NUM < #{noticeBoardNum} )
SELECT NOTICE_BOARD_NUM , NOTICE_BOARD_TITLE FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_BOARD_NUM = ( SELECT NVL(MIN(NOTICE_BOARD_NUM), 0) FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_BOARD_NUM > #{noticeBoardNum} )
